description: Texas Twister is a fictional comic book superhero that appears in publications from Marvel Comics. The character was created by writer Roy Thomas and penciller George PÃ©rez and first appeared in Fantastic Four vol.1 #177 (December 1976). He was a S.H.I.E.L.D. Super-Agent and he is a member of the Rangers, the American Southwest superhero team.
name: Texas Twister
powers: High degree of resistance to dizziness
